content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi ;

if OBJECT_id('silver.vendor') is not NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vendor go 

create EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vendor 
    with(
        LOCATION = 'silver_layer/vendor',
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file 
    )
    as select * from bronze.vendor go 

select * from silver.vendor go
